MemberSignature.Value: public int BlockAlign { get; }
.property instance int32 BlockAlign
Public ReadOnly Property BlockAlign As Integer
public: property int BlockAlign { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取和设置字节中的块对齐。

span.span: Gets and sets the block alignment in bytes.
The value for the block alignment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用于播放和记录音频软件处理块中的音频数据。Software for playback and recording of audio handles audio data in blocks. 这些块的大小是的该值的倍数属性。The sizes of these blocks are multiples of the value of the property. 块对齐值是音频的某一特定格式的原子单元 （即块） 中的字节数。Block alignment value is the number of bytes in an atomic unit (that is, a block) of audio for a particular format. 对于脉冲编码调制 (PCM) 格式的公式计算块对齐方式，如下所示为：For Pulse Code Modulation (PCM) formats, the formula for calculating block alignment is as follows: - 阻止对齐方式 = 每个通道的示例 x 数字节数Block Alignment = Bytes per Sample x Number of Channels 例如，16 位 PCM 格式单声道音频块对齐值为 2 （每个示例 x 1 通道 2 个字节）。For example, the block alignment value for 16-bit PCM format mono audio is 2 (2 bytes per sample x 1 channel). 对于 16 位 PCM 格式立体声音频，块对齐值为 4。For 16-bit PCM format stereo audio, the block alignment value is 4. 从设备读取和写入的数据始终必须在块的开头处开始。Data written and read from a device must always start at the beginning of a block. 例如，它是非法开始播放的 PCM 中间示例 （即未块对齐的边界上） 的数据。For example, it is illegal to start playback of PCM data in the middle of a sample (meaning on a boundary that is not block-aligned).
